item.title: About
item.description: Chathuranga Lakmal Rajapaksha Software Engineer, AI and Machine Learning Researcher I am very passionate about following topics, Artificial Intelligence Machine Learning Deep Learning You can find my projects and contribute on GitHub. Have questions or suggestions? Feel free to ask. Thanks for reading! Happy Coding!!!
